definitions.definition: Thread or cloth made from flax fiber.
Domestic textiles, such as tablecloths , bedding , towels , underclothes , etc., that are made of linen or linen-like fabrics of cotton or other fibers; linens .
examples: She put the freshly cleaned linens into the linen closet.

definitions.definition: A light beige colour, like that of linen cloth undyed.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Thread or cloth made from flax fiber.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) Domestic textiles, such as tablecloths , bedding , towels , underclothes , etc., that are made of linen or linen-like fabrics of cotton or other fibers; linens .
A light beige colour, like that of linen cloth undyed.
